intro: Euphrasia × lerschii, commonly known as the hybrid eyebright, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to Europe. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its small, bright yellow flowers with dark markings. The plant typically grows to a height of 10–30 cm and features hairy stems and lance-shaped leaves. It thrives in moist, shady environments and is often found in woodland areas or along stream banks. Euphrasia × lerschii is valued for its ornamental appeal and has been used in traditional herbal medicine for its purported health benefits.
